arStrings.szText:
Merged in Gaping Crevasse in southern Kehjistan with Mucus-Slick Egg to summon a powerful enemy. Requires {c_number}2{/c}. Acquired from Hall of the Penitent in World Tier 4: Torment only by the one who performs the summoning. 

Drops randomly from World Bosses.
A broken soulstone. Simply holding it sends a dull ache through your arm.
